sentences.sContent: A car of comparable size would cost far more abroad.
sentences.sCn: 同样大小的汽车在国外要贵得多。

sentences.sContent: ...nursing homes and other providers by amounts comparable to the productivity savings routinely made in other industries with the help of new technologies and new ways to organize work...
...Others were lesser known but of comparable quality...
...A 2011 report from Harvard University shows that Massachusetts produces math scores comparable to South Korea and Finland...

phrases.pCn: 可比较的，比得上的；与…相容；可同…比较

words.tran: 比较；对照；比喻；比较关系

trans.tranCn: 可比较的； 类似的； 比得上的
trans.tranOther: similar to something else in size, number, quality etc, so that you can make a comparison
